resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete this preset? This action cannot be undone.
Tap the heart icon to favorite presets
Tap the bottom right button to create a preset
Fetch latest preset config from remote server

[Environment] Daylight outdoor or well-lit indoor\n[Scenes] Street, portrait, landscape, architecture\n[Tips] Classic film aesthetic with rich, vintage colors. Look for scenes with light-shadow contrast to enhance depth

[Environment] Natural or soft artificial light\n[Scenes] Portraits, still life, cafés, artistic scenes\n[Tips] Soft light creates dreamy atmosphere. Perfect for emotional photos. Keep the subject in sharp focus

[Environment] Morning, dusk or overcast diffused light\n[Scenes] Children, gardens, parks, romantic scenes\n[Tips] Darker tones create mystery. Dreamy soft light for fairy tale vibes. Seek colorful scenes

[Environment] Strong light-shadow contrast, direct sunlight or spotlights\n[Scenes] Architecture, documentary, street, artistic portraits\n[Tips] Use contrast to highlight subject contours. Perfect for geometric lines and rich textures. Keep composition clean

[Environment] Natural outdoor light, forests, meadows, plant-rich scenes\n[Scenes] Plants, forest walks, spring outdoors, fresh portraits\n[Tips] Bright tones highlight freshness. Greens appear natural and transparent. Perfect for plants and nature

[Environment] Sunny weather or blue sky background\n[Scenes] Seaside, urban architecture, sky, cool-toned scenes\n[Tips] Cool tones enhance blue performance. Perfect for sky, water and urban architecture. Creates transparent, calm atmosphere

[Environment] 20 minutes before sunrise or after sunset\n[Scenes] City night views, bright lights, water reflections\n[Tips] Strong warm-cool contrast. Perfect for city lights and night scenes. Seek water surfaces for reflection effects

[Environment] Backlit or side-lit scenes\n[Scenes] Portraits, emotional photography, artistic scenes, soft beauty\n[Tips] Black mist filter creates dreamy atmosphere. Perfect for beautiful portraits. Use backlight for halo effects

[Environment] Daylight outdoor or ample natural light\n[Scenes] Japanese-style portraits, street, daily records, travel\n[Tips] Simulates Fuji NC film. Bright tones, soft natural colors. Perfect for daily records and Japanese aesthetics

[Environment] Natural or soft artificial light\n[Scenes] Street documentary, humanistic photography, life records, storytelling\n[Tips] Pro mode with fixed parameters. ISO 50 ensures pure image quality. Slight underexposure preserves details. Perfect for capturing real life moments

[Environment] Bright outdoor or indoor natural light\n[Scenes] Fresh Japanese portraits, campus, travel, daily life\n[Tips] Bright tones, higher saturation. Perfect for fresh, bright portraits and scenes. Seek well-lit scenes

[Environment] Snowy, overcast or low color temperature scenes\n[Scenes] Snow scenes, winter streets, warm indoor, festive atmosphere\n[Tips] Warm tones balance snow\'s coolness. Creates cozy atmosphere. Perfect for winter scenes and warm light environments

[Environment] Restaurants, kitchens, food photography scenes\n[Scenes] Food photography, beverages, baking, fine cuisine\n[Tips] Darker tones highlight food texture. Moderate saturation keeps food\'s true colors. Perfect for fine food and beverages

[Environment] Daylight outdoor or ample light\n[Scenes] Street, architecture, landscape, daily records\n[Tips] Simulates Leica\'s German style. Deep tones, restrained colors. Perfect for photography enthusiasts seeking Leica aesthetics

[Environment] Daylight outdoor or soft light\n[Scenes] Portraits, landscapes, Japanese scenes, artistic photography\n[Tips] Pro mode auto exposure. Slight overexposure creates dreamy feel. Vintage tones with dreamy soft light. Perfect for beautiful portraits and landscapes

[Environment] Well-lit outdoor or indoor\n[Scenes] Landscapes, architecture, portraits, artistic photography\n[Tips] Simulates Hasselblad Natural Color Solution. Rich but true-to-life colors. Perfect for high-quality color performance

[Environment] Sunny weather or bright vacation scenes\n[Scenes] Seaside, vacation, travel, summer outdoors\n[Tips] Bright and transparent tones. Lower saturation creates freshness. Perfect for vacation and travel scenes. Capture joyful moments

[Environment] Soft light or overcast\n[Scenes] Emotional portraits, artistic photography, still life, architecture\n[Tips] Retains slight color information. Dreamy soft light creates artistic feel. Perfect for expressive black and white photography

[Environment] Restaurants, cafés, cozy indoor\n[Scenes] Food, desserts, beverages, delicate items\n[Tips] Dreamy soft light creates warm atmosphere. Darker tones highlight texture. Perfect for fine food and cozy scenes

[Environment] Daylight outdoor or indoor, seaside, sky, water surface\n[Scenes] Landscapes, architecture, portraits, still life\n[Tips] Blue clarity style with cool tones creates fresh and transparent feel. Slight underexposure preserves details. Dreamy soft light adds atmosphere. Perfect for fresh landscapes and portraits

[Environment] Sunny outdoor, well-lit scenes\n[Scenes] Street, portraits, landscapes, vintage scenes\n[Tips] Sunny vintage style with 5000K color temp for natural colors. Negative tone creates vintage feel. Slight underexposure preserves highlight details. Warm soft light adds retro atmosphere. Perfect for sunny outdoor portraits and landscapes

[Environment] Night city, neon signs, bustling streets\n[Scenes] Night views, street scenes, portraits, urban landscapes\n[Tips] Neon lights style with rich filter enhancing color saturation. Gentle soft light creates dreamy feel. Slight underexposure preserves neon details. Perfect for night city neon scenes

[Environment] Old districts, vintage scenes, nostalgic indoor settings\n[Scenes] Old objects, street scenes, portraits, storytelling scenes\n[Tips] Retro nostalgia style with 65% vintage filter for nostalgic feel. Low tone adds retro atmosphere. Reduced saturation simulates old photo texture. Perfect for nostalgic themed photos
OMaster is a color grading parameter management tool designed for OPPO/OnePlus/Realme mobile photography enthusiasts.
You can view, favorite, and reproduce Master Mode photography color grading parameters, including exposure, contrast, saturation, color temperature, and more.
Pure local operation, data stored locally

OMaster is a color grading parameter management tool designed for OPPO/OnePlus/Realme mobile photography enthusiasts. Here, you can view, favorite, and reproduce Master Mode photography color grading parameters.

• View Master Mode color grading parameters
• Support multiple preset styles
• Pure local operation, data stored locally
• No internet required
To provide better service, we use Umeng Analytics SDK to collect app usage data.
You have the right to access, correct, and delete your personal information. To exercise these rights, please contact us through the in-app contact information.
To conveniently view parameters while shooting, OMaster needs floating window permission
1. Find "Allow display over other apps" or similar option in settings page
If you encounter permission activation failure:
Tap the ⋮ menu in the top right
Tip: After removing restrictions, please ensure only "Floating Window" permission is granted
If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact:\nDeveloper: Silas\nEmail: iboy66lee@qq.com
Master Mode Color Grading Library v1.0
View professional photography color grading parameters for Master Mode
Support multiple preset styles to meet different shooting needs
Pure local operation, data stored locally
I have read and agree to
• We use Umeng SDK for analytics\n• Collect device info to optimize app experience
Tap User Agreement & Privacy Policy to view details
To conveniently view parameters while shooting, OMaster needs floating window permission
Tip: After removing restrictions, ensure only "Floating Window" permission is granted
